      • send

        java.util.List<DTO> send(java.util.List<DTO> messages)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send a batch of DTOs to the server.
        Parameters:
        messages - in a list to be sent.
        Returns:
        rejected list of DTO objects. List is null if all objects were accepted.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
